song.title: Closer
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .A B C#m B
[V] .C#m B Your love has ravished my heart . E/G# A And taken me over, taken me over || . C#m B And all I want is to be . E/G# A With You forever, with You forever
[C] .E B/D# Pull me a little closer . C#m Take me a little deeper . A I want to know Your heart . E I want to know Your heart|| . B/D# Cause Your love is so much sweeter . C#m Than anything Iâ€™ve tasted . A I want to know Your heart . E I want to know Your heart
[B] .A E B C#m whoa, whoa, how great Your love is for me || .A E B C#m whoa, whoa, how great is Your love
song.presentation: V C V C B C
